alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Kit Carson County; Yuma (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued May 18 at 4:17AM MDT until May 19 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 001...013...027...041...252...253 AND 254... * Affected Area...In Colorado...Fire Weather Zone 252 Yuma... Fire Weather Zone 253 Kit Carson and Fire Weather Zone 254 Cheyenne. In Kansas...Fire Weather Zone 001 Cheyenne...Fire Weather Zone 013 Sherman...Fire Weather Zone 027 Wallace and Fire Weather Zone 041 Greeley. * Winds...Southwest to West Southwest at 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 10 to 15 percent. * Temperatures...In the lower to middle 90s. * Impacts...Extreme and unpredictable fire behavior. Any fires that start may rapidly grow and spread out of control. * Additional Information...An abrupt northerly wind shift is anticipated late Thursday afternoon and evening. Some uncertainty persists with regard to the precise timing of the wind shift, which could occur during the late afternoon or a few hours later, after sunset.
info.instruction: Outdoor burning is not advised on Thursday. Any fires that start may rapidly grow and spread out of control.
